title: Front page spectating!
body:
I used to look at the front page and think about how cool it would be for my name to be there. Im not saying I watch any of the games on the front page (cause I never did), but I used to click through the 5 games reading the summoner names and looking at the champions {{champion:35}}  (later playing with those people, potentially). BUT now the front page is showing aram games and normal games... wats the point in watching an aram game or a normal game, riot plz bring back high elo ranked games to front page. Clearly this isn't a big issue but I do care :)

TLDR: front page spectating is showing normals/aram games and I want it back to high elo ranked games.

replies.body: Thanks for the report. We are investigating now! Will update this thread once we have an update.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=u6gnd8E0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-16T22:07:21.386+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report. We are investigating now! Will update this thread once we have an update.

I was wondering this exact thing. I had assumed when it was out that it allowed players to see good players play, that are a little closer in skill compared to the pros in competitions.
